description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Fun and easy to play classic space shooter that tries to keep the same style of old school games from the 80s-90s. Many levels, final bosses, extra weapons.  Any comments? Suggestions? What would you change? Post your comments at twitter @distantgalaxies, my gamertag LEM73 or my forum at luisespinosa.com/forum
